summary: Website for a cricket tournament player auction with 4 team logins and an admin login; admin can create/manage players with base prices, name teams, and configure each team’s purse (in crores); teams can view player list, their purchased players, and remaining purse.

existing_features.title: Implement application authentication with exactly 5 roles/accounts: 4 team accounts and 1 admin account, each using a username (ID) and password to log in.
After team login, show a Team Dashboard where the team can view (a) the full list of players with their base prices, (b) the team’s own player list (roster), and (c) the team’s remaining purse.

Provide an Admin Dashboard that allows the admin to manage auction data needed for the team views: create/edit/delete players (including base price) and configure each team’s total purse; admin can assign/unassign players to teams to build rosters.
Add basic navigation and routing for: Login, Team Dashboard (team-specific), and Admin Dashboard; route access must be role-gated (admin-only vs team-only).
Apply a cohesive, cricket-auction-themed visual design across the app (colors, typography, spacing, layout) using Tailwind and existing UI components; avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Role-based authentication with separate logins for 4 teams and 1 admin
After login, teams can view the full list of players with their base price
Each team account can view its own players list (team roster)
Each team account can view its remaining purse/budget

Create backend data models and stable storage for: teams (4 teams), admin account, players (with base price), and team rosters (which players belong to which team), including each team’s purse budget configuration.
Compute and expose remaining purse per team as: teamTotalPurse minus the sum of base prices of players assigned to that team; ensure the Team Dashboard shows the computed value.
Provide defined login IDs/usernames and passwords for the 4 team accounts and 1 admin account (initial credentials for use in the app)
Admin can name/rename the 4 teams and set each team’s purse using units in crores (₹ Cr)

projectName: Cricket tournament player auction site with 4 team logins + admin, player list, rosters, and purse tracking
